text: Vadzim Lialin (born 15 November 1982) is a Belarusian rower. He won the silver medal in the coxless four at the 2016 European Rowing Championships. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Belarusian male rowers Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic rowers of Belarus Category:Rowers at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Vadzim Lialin
